About.description: I am a Software Engineering graduate with extensive experience in application development using technologies such as JavaScript, React, Docker, Spring, Java, JSP, and HTML. I have a strong background in mathematics, programming, and system design, having worked on projects ranging from web solutions to distributed applications and microservices. I have experience with both relational and non-relational databases, as well as cloud platforms such as AWS and Firebase, where I have designed and deployed scalable and efficient solutions. Currently, I focus on web development, particularly backend development, and I am involved in the creation of custom portals, service integration, and optimizing user experience in Liferay. I am interested in designing and developing efficient and scalable systems, which leads me to explore the field of digital architecture. Passionate about technological innovation and motivated by solving complex problems, I actively participate in personal and collaborative projects that aim to drive technological progress.

resp1.text: Development of custom portals in Liferay 7.4 for the Vitaly project, integrating services and optimizing user experience

resp2.text: Issue resolution and continuous improvement of portal functionalities

resp1.text: Internship in Computer Engineering specializing in backend development with Java and Spring Boot

resp2.text: Development of Restful APIs and microservices with scalable architecture

resp3.text: Application of design patterns for efficient code structure

resp4.text: Code optimization and execution of load testing to ensure performance

detail2.text: Completed the degree in 4 years, passing all subjects on the first attempt (with 3 academic honors, 11 outstanding, and 18 notable)

detail3.text: Honors: Waves and Electromagnetism, Statistics, and Computability

detail4.text: I also scored a 10 in my Final Degree Project (TFG), titled 'Web Platform for Academic Work Coordination'

detail5.text: Recognition awarded by the Indra Chair and the University of Oviedo for the best Final Degree Thesis in the year 2023/2024
